message: I'm excited to offer you this unique product for sale. I believe it's a great opportunity for you to acquire something that will benefit you significantly. I'm willing to sell it to you for $9500.

Thank you for the offer, Alice.  I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. While I see the value in this product, $9500 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable with right now.  I'm willing to offer $8500 for it.  What do you think?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. I believe it's a fair price considering the value the product will bring to you. What do you think?
